amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent several provisions of the Act from taking effect until it is determined that it will not harm water quality or water availability for agricultural producers in California's Delta region (Contra Costa, Sacramento, San Joaquin, Solano, and Yolo Counties).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 113-340 to prevent several provisions of the Act from taking effect until it is determined that it will not harm water quality or water availability for agricultural producers in California's Delta region (Contra Costa, Sacramento, San Joaquin, Solano, and Yolo Counties).

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 230 (Roll no. 47).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. McNerney.
